p305_new_funding_detail: Me escucharon hablar en un evento y ofrecieron financiarnos. Leyeron algo que escribí  y me ofrecieron un fondo.
p305_new_funding_strategy: No hubo tal estrategia. Como mucho ir al evento a hablar.
p311_funding_plans:
Una compañera recibe las convocatorias, las evaluamos, las escribimos, las presentamos.
Yo salgo a vender productos y servicios de la Fundación o a dar charlas.
p312_funding_priorities: Sobrevivir este año. Conseguir 150,000 dólares para sostener el año próximo. Fortalecer nuestro área de producción.
p325_funding_barriers: Que depende de mi y soy la presidenta, directora ejecutiva y en contexto de crisis estoy totalmente sobrepasada de tareas.

p311_funding_plans:
Estrategie de l' Organisation
Elaboration du plan d'Action
Elaboratiin du Budget 
Elaboration de la stratégie financière
p312_funding_priorities:
1. Reformar a estrutura organica e funcioal da organisation de modo a se adaptar à grande dimensão geografica do país e ao contexto politico, económico e docial do país
2. Preparar o FONGA e as suas organizações membros no engajamento politico e social
3.Engajar as instituições do Governo e do Estado em díalogo estruturado
4. Monitorar os compromissos internacionais assumidos pelo governo
5. Influenciar as politicas publicas, processos e estratégias.
p325_funding_barriers: Equipe très limitée et travaillant sans percevoir les remunerations

p311_funding_plans: À Coordination SUD, mon poste est en charge de la veille sur les financements, principalement au service de nos membres, et dans un second temps pour Coordination SUD elle-même.
p312_funding_priorities: Renforcer le financement existant auprès d’un bailleur unique, tout en entamant une démarche de diversification, sans cadre stratégique clair.

p325_funding_barriers: Aucune personne n’est actuellement dédiée à cette mission.

p305_new_funding_detail: We identified funding resources through thorough research, networking, donor mapping, analysis of past funding trends, attending relevant forums, and using online platforms and databases focused on donor information and grant opportunities.
p305_new_funding_strategy: Our strategy to achieve results was to set clear goals, work as a team with everyone having their own tasks, connect with the right people, use digital tools to help us, and regularly check our progress to stay on track and make improvements when needed.
p310_funding_docs: Strategic_plan Portfolio Donor_database Proposal_templates Comms_strategy Resource_mobilization_strategy
p311_funding_plans: We follow a structured process to seek and prioritize funding opportunities, which includes regularly monitoring donor platforms and websites, conducting donor mapping, discussing opportunities in team meetings, assessing alignment with our organizational goals and community needs, and then prioritizing those that match our capacity and impact areas
p312_funding_priorities:
1.Women and youth empowerment through education, skills development, and leadership initiatives
2.Health and reproductive rights, with a focus on access to quality services in underserved areas
3. Climate change and disaster risk reduction to build resilient communities
4. Democratic governance and civic engagement to strengthen citizen participation
5. Digital transformation and innovation to improve service delivery and outreach
6. Strengthening institutional capacity for long-term sustainability and impact
p325_funding_barriers: Our organization faces institutional barriers such as limited long-term funding support, lack of flexible funding for core operations.

p305_new_funding_detail: Call for proposal, donor relations, review the strategic framework of the donor agencies in Cambodia which fit to the mandate of the organization.
p305_new_funding_strategy:
1. Participate in the donor strategic framework development such as EU, DCA, etc...
2. Volunteer in the working group, task force, steering committee, network to build good networking and relation with donors and organizational performance and credibility to the external. 
3. Sale initiative to the donor and volunteer to start the initiative.

p310_funding_docs: Strategic_plan Portfolio Donor_database Proposal_templates Comms_strategy Resource_mobilization_strategy
p311_funding_plans: We identify funding opportunities through research, networking, and stakeholder engagement. We prioritize opportunities based on alignment with our strategic goals, project needs, and potential impact. A cross-functional team reviews and assesses each opportunity, ensuring effective allocation of resources and maximizing funding potential.
p312_funding_priorities: Our organization's strategic funding priorities for 2025-2026 include securing EU and other international funding, building partnerships, and diversifying funding streams.
p325_funding_barriers: Our organization faces challenges such as limited long-term funding support, lack of flexible funding for core operations, and difficulty in building strategic partnerships with donors and stakeholders.
